topic.title: Flowers by Season
topic.shortdesc: Flowers and seasons ar intimately bound to each other. Most of the flowers are season-specific.

body.p: The various climatic changes that occu in cyclic pattern are termed as 'Seasons'. There are four general seasons occurring on Earth - Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter.
Flowers and seasons are intimately bound to each other. Most of the flowers are season-specific. However, some flowers are found throughout the year, not particularly affected by changing seasons.
All CSS files in the webhelp folder will be referenced in hpe_webhelp.css.
